function: Pandana may be a combination of Panda and Bandana.

function:
When confused in the cross section, erect the stick and follow whichever side it falls on.
The Path-Finding Stick problem is that it can’t detect dangerous things like a bomb.
appears_in: Move Fast, Doraemon! The Galactic Grandprix
Nobita and the Birth of Japan
Nobita and the Birth of Japan

jp_name: しんじゅ製造アコヤケース Shinju Seizō Akoya Kēsu
function:
It used to produce pearl when placed in the water.
Shinju seizō akoyakēsu made up of word Shinju (Pearl), Seizō (Production), Akoya (meaning Akoya pearl oyster), and Kēsu (Case).

jp_name: ペコペコバッタ Peko Peko Batta
function:
The Peko Peko Grasshopper will jump into a person's nose to the point of where the target will eventually cry and beg for forgiveness. It may also cause them to be extremely repentful, wishing to forget their past sins and wrongs.
The Peko Peko Grasshopper may be distracted out by forcing the host person sneeze it out (generally with Black Pepper).
Same as how you do it with Guardian Paper but instead The paper gives pestilence to the one who prayed at it, which is the opposite of the said former gadget.

Apply it on a rock and then wipe it. After that, it will act like a dog and perform behaviors such as barking. Its diet is composed up of sand and water. The harder you wipe it onto a rock, the gentler the pet would be.

jp_name: 絵本入りこみぐつ Ehon Hairikomi Gutsu
function: With the shoes, a person can enter the world inside a story book. But the user must not interfere with characters or objects inside the story or else the story will end up differently.

jp_name: ピノキオの花 Pinokio no hana
function:
Pinocchio's Flower (Japanese: ピノキオの花 Pinokio no hana) is a gadget owned by Doraemon. It only appeared on the 2005 anime series episode "The Pinocchio's Flower".
It sprinkles glittery dust on the person's nose. If they lie, then their noses willl grow long like Pinocchio's. If they tell the truth, then it doesn't grow or their noses go back to normal.

The Power Fan (パワーファン) is a gadget that makes it's only appearance in Hudson Soft's Doraemon video game. It acts as a weapon that when used, creates solid wind that heads towards a target.
It is considered to have power that surpasses the Air Cannon and appears similar to the Festival Fan, though with different kanji and white in color.

jp_name: 返事先取りポスト "Henji sakidori posuto"
function:
Write a letter to the person you want to address. You can write any type of letter such as a love letter. After that, put the letter you have written into this post box, You will immediately receive a reply to the person you sent the letter without having to be accepted by that person. 
Remember!. You have to write the compleate address you want to go to, and it must be accompanied by stamp, so that the letter can be received and immediately get recive a reply. Whether a letter is answered or not depends on the person you are writing to.
appears_in: How to Get a Reply to a Letter You Haven't Sent

jp_name: キンシひょうしき Kinshihyōshiki
function:
Just put a ban with a marker in the blank place. This will make people can't do the ban.
It can be removed using its own pliers, or exposed to wet objects such as rain.

jp_name: パズル貯金箱 Pazuru Chokin-bako
function: This gadget is like a piggy bank made up of labyrinthine building block puzzle pieces of various shapes and colors. It has a slot at the top of it's face.
